biotools.summary:
USE (Universal Spectrum Explorer) A standalone (web-)application for cross-resource spectrum comparison.

The Universal Spectrum Explorer (USE) is a web-based tool based for cross-resource (peptide) spectrum visualization and comparison (https://www.proteomicsdb.org/use/).

bioschemas.name: Universal Spectrum Explorer
